title: Can Ola's electric bikes overtake Hero's Splendor?
description: Ola Electric recently launched three bikes: Roadster, Roadster X, and Roadster Pro. With competitive pricing and advanced features, these models are set to rival popular brands like Hero Moto. Ola aims to boost electric vehicle adoption in India's motorcycle sector with these new offerings.
